snippet.title: Big Tower Tiny Square Trailer
snippet.description:
A new BIG TOWER game is coming soon! Wishlist the Big NEON Tower here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/758010/Big_NEON_Tower_VS_Tiny_Square/

Dodge bullets, leap lava pits, and wall-jump your way up the Big Tower in this precision platformer. The controls are simple and the obstacles are fair. But do you have the skill necessary to make it to the top? No sprint, no double-jump, and no floaty controls! Just quick deaths and generous respawn points. Precision is key to success!

Inspired by single-screen arcade games, Big Tower Tiny Square is one giant level broken up into large single-screen sections. Each obstacle has been meticulously placed. Each section devilishly designed. It will take precision and skill to navigate the maze-like tower.
